backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend/index.html feature fixes with metadata, components, tests, and confidence fields.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing index.html as a full proposal page and App.tsx as a redirect wrapper.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base variables, dark mode tokens, and global resets for theming and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Main Valentine proposal page with animated visuals, intro overlay, interactive proposal flow, and evasive No-button logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component that redirects to index.html while preserving URL parameters and shows a loading screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity context providing login, logout, identity persistence, and auth lifecycle state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors from CSS vars, extended animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the singleâ€‘file Valentine site architecture, issues, and feature requirements.
